body: Three types of public cruises are offered on a 50' Catamaran which offers 1400 square feet of deck space while the multi-hull construction makes her comfortable, stable and safe. A Sunset Cruise (two hours), a Coastal Cruise (two hours), and a Waterfront Cruise (one hour). Experience one of these cruises while enjoying beautiful views of the coast and the channel islands. There is plenty of room for you and a guest or a large party. On board you will be able to purchase beer, wine and soda. Light snacks and restrooms are on hand for your convenience. Friday nights in the summer we offer live music cruises for a relaxing atmosphere.
priceLong:
**$45 and $55 per person**

Live Music Cruises: **$65 per person** (Friday nights in July)
timeLong: Time varies depending on cruise - please call with questions about specific dates
title: Sunset, Coastal, and Waterfront Cruises
